06 Nov 2013

secure alternative to ssh-agent

I'm really impressed by this blog post. It sums up why the use of ssh-agent is a security threat.

Not only warning it shows a very comfortable way with the inbuilt ProxyCommand to circumvent the threat.

20 Aug 2013

Howto: Duplikate mit rdfind finden und mit einem Hardlink ersetzen

Am Wochenende habe ich mir wieder mein lokales Backup angeschaut, um es dann wie jeden Monat auf die externe Platte zu spiegeln. Dabei ist aufgefallen, dass  backintime  sehr intelligent nur die geänderten oder neuen Dateien übernimmt. Allerdings sind fallen Umbenennungen bzw. verschobene Dateien jedes Mal mit der vollen Größe ins Gewicht.

22 Jun 2013

Learning from mistakes and talk about

I just found a video when etsy talks on softdevtube.com about What went right, what went wrong.

Alternatively you can watch the slides of that presentation.

Scaling Etsy: What Went Wrong, What Went Right from Ross Snyder

What makes me thinking it is worth mentioning these slides is, that I believe in the same principles (transparency, cross functional teams, talking about mistakes, reevaluate former decisions, ... ) written in there

Enjoy!

10 Jun 2013

opensource community collaboration at it's best

Today I had a great experience with contributing to an opensource project redline (Redline is a pure Java library for manipulating RPM Package Manager packages). Actually it was last week and today I had this pleasure.

Last week I fixed some lines in code and pulled a merge request. The same day, just 2 hours later, it was merged.

Today I asked for a release to benefit from these changes without publishing an separate inhouse version. I offered some additional refactorings to justify a release, however Craig W. Blake did not discussed or requested some more changes. An new release is already online.

I really appreciate that kind of cooperation. That's why I love opensource and my company Immobilienscout24 is sharing and contributing to the opensource world.

See our projects at github.com/ImmobilienScout24. Feel free to use it, to contribute or just report bugs!

update

German version is available at http://developer.immobilienscout24.de/2013/05/opensource-zusammenarbeit-von-seiner-besten-seite/.
